name: Earth+Seek UK v1
description:
Welcome to Earth+Seek UK

Earth+Seek UK runs alongside Google Earth. You become an armchair explorer roaming over the UK with a purpose, discovering new places and learning snippets of information about each.

It is designed to be a relaxed experience and there is no timer or scores just the joy of discovering something new. If you get stuck hints are provided for each question and if you wish you can skip to the next question so you will never be stuck. 

The game does not add any files to your computer. Nor does it need access to any of your information. Simply save the file into a folder or on the desktop. Unzip the file and then double click on the game exe file to get started.
